attributes.title: Worst app on the market
attributes.review: This app is horrible. Crashes, no good information, and COMPLETELY USELESS. Needs to be deleted off the App Store

attributes.title: This app does NOT work as intended
attributes.review: I’ve tried to use this app for days now, but it DOES NOT WORK. I’ve tried signing up, but it refuses to work.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: Too many glitches, made my kids hate me, and my wife left me because of it. DO NOT DOWNLOAD. Shouldn’t be on the App Store

attributes.title: not it
attributes.review: this app is quite useless and it always drains my battery percentage, not only that but i feel like it makes my phone crash as much as i’d like to keep up with this news and donald trump this app just makes it 10 times harder it is utterly disgusting.

attributes.title: Too many Crashes!
attributes.review: If I could I would give this app 0 stars.

attributes.title: Horible😡
attributes.review: This app is trash!!!! Absolute garbage! No one should use it! It made my phone crash every time o opened the app! I hate it so much! And I hate trump! #savetiktok

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review:
I was so excited to get this app .but when I got it  i was so so bored . IT is super boring I wish I never got this app 
It’s truly the worst app ever

attributes.title: Ew literally so bad!
attributes.review: Honestly horrendous app and the logo is horrible and I hate the orange man when u first open the app honestly disgusting!! Delete the app from the App Store 🧚‍♀️💕✨🌈

attributes.title: TERRIBLE. DO. NOT. DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: super scary i downloaded it to learn "trumpet rights unanimously might produce" because i thought that's what t.r.u.m.p. stands for i was sadly greeted by hitler himself and now he FOLLOWS ME EVERYWHERE! please be careful and don't download!!!!!! 🧚🏼

attributes.title: Gen Z
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever!!! Trump never gave me Starbucks but it did give me life time scars. I don’t like him the app is a scam and we deserve better I want Starbucks bye.
